content: If you want a fully clean install, remove the ...appdata\roaming\thunderbird folder, not just the profile folder. And then reinstall. Do you have the old profile? Is the old computer still available? The cleanest install would be to - do fresh install of thunderbird and exit - on old computer, with Thunderbird not running, copy c:\users\<yourid>\appdata\roaming\thunderbird to USB stick - on new computer, copy that thunderbird folder to c:\users\<yourid>\appdata\roaming, and allow the overwrites. - start thunderbird.
creator: davidsk

content: Sorry, I made a mistake in describing the situation. Only one address (Gmai) shows this message. All other addresses are correct.
